comment: I appreciate how she is flexible with assignment due dates. There is a lot of reading, and the discussion post assignments can be lengthy. But, she gives you ample time to do it, so that makes her reasonable.

I had this class in the summer and it is a lot of reading. My biggest complaint is the lack of feedback. It was the last week before I had an idea of my grade in the class! We had a professor approval need for assignment and she did it AFTER the due date and just left a lot to do in little time. I wouldn't sign up for her again if I had a choice.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: She has been one of my favorite professors so far. I have honestly learned so much from her. She clearly cares that we are well prepared for what teaching will throw at us.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria
